title: tour: Editor not showing
body:
Contesto: https://go-tour-ita.appspot.com/basics/1
The go editor is not showing up.

There is a `hidden` class on the editor: 

    <div class="relative-content hidden" ng-class="{hidden: toc.lessons[lessonId].Pages[curPage-1].Files.length==0}">

Removing the hidden token the editor comes back again, but it dosen't work
